code_improvements.title: Add React Query error boundaries for API failure resilience
code_improvements.description: Implement error boundaries around React Query hooks to gracefully handle API failures and provide user-friendly error messages instead of crashing the application.
code_improvements.rationale: Improves user experience and application stability when backend services are unavailable or return errors.

code_improvements.title: Implement Leaflet map component lazy loading
code_improvements.description: Add code splitting for Leaflet map components to reduce initial bundle size and improve first contentful paint metrics.
code_improvements.rationale: Leaflet and its plugins add significant weight to the bundle. Lazy loading can improve initial load performance.

code_improvements.title: Add TypeScript strict mode and improve type coverage
code_improvements.description: Enable strict mode in tsconfig.json and add proper type definitions for API responses and Zustand stores to catch potential runtime errors at compile time.
code_improvements.rationale: Strict TypeScript catches more bugs during development and improves code maintainability.

code_improvements.title: Implement WebSocket reconnection logic with exponential backoff
code_improvements.description: Add robust reconnection handling for WebSocket connections (VITE_WS_URL) with exponential backoff to handle network interruptions gracefully.
code_improvements.rationale: WebSocket connections can drop due to network issues. Proper reconnection logic ensures continuous real-time updates.

code_improvements.title: Add React Query cache persistence for offline support
code_improvements.description: Implement cache persistence using @tanstack/react-query-persist-client to enable basic offline functionality and faster app startup.
code_improvements.rationale: Improves user experience in areas with poor connectivity and provides faster subsequent app loads.
